verses.verse: יְשֻׂשׂ֥וּם <WH7797> shall be glad מִדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> The wilderness וְצִיָּ֑ה <WH6723> and the solitary place וְתָגֵ֧ל <WH1523> shall rejoice עֲרָבָ֛ה <WH6160> for them and the desert וְתִפְרַ֖ח <WH6524> and blossom כַּחֲבַצָּֽלֶת׃ <WH2261> as the rose

פָּרֹ֨חַ <WH6524> It shall blossom תִּפְרַ֜ח <WH6524> abundantly וְתָגֵ֗ל <WH1523> and rejoice אַ֚ף <WH637> with גִּילַ֣ת <WH1525> even with joy וְרַנֵּ֔ן <WH7442> and shout כְּב֤וֹד <WH3519> the glory הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> of Lebanon נִתַּן־ <WH5414> shall be given לָ֔הּ הֲדַ֥ר <WH1926> unto it the excellency הַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3760> of Carmel וְהַשָּׁר֑וֹן <WH8289> and Sharon הֵ֛מָּה <WH1992> They יִרְא֥וּ <WH7200> they shall see כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֲדַ֥ר <WH1926> [and] the excellency אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> of our God ס
חַזְּק֖וּ <WH2388> Strengthen יָדַ֣יִם <WH3027> hands רָפ֑וֹת <WH7504> ye the weak וּבִרְכַּ֥יִם <WH1290> knees כֹּשְׁל֖וֹת <WH3782> the feeble אַמֵּֽצוּ׃ <WH553> and confirm

אִמְרוּ֙ <WH559> Say לְנִמְהֲרֵי־ <WH4116> to them [that are] of a fearful לֵ֔ב <WH3820> heart חִזְק֖וּ <WH2388> Be strong אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּירָ֑אוּ <WH3372> fear הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <WH430> not behold your God נָקָ֣ם <WH5359> [with] vengeance יָב֔וֹא <WH935> will come גְּמ֣וּל <WH1576> [with] a recompence אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> [even] God ה֥וּא <WH1931> he יָב֖וֹא <WH935> he will come וְיֹשַׁעֲכֶֽם׃ <WH3467> and save

אָ֥ז <WH227> Then תִּפָּקַ֖חְנָה <WH6491> shall be opened עֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> Then the eyes עִוְרִ֑ים <WH5787> of the blind וְאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> and the ears חֵרְשִׁ֖ים <WH2795> of the deaf תִּפָּתַֽחְנָה׃ <WH6605> shall be unstopped

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יְדַלֵּ֤ג <WH1801> [man] leap כָּֽאַיָּל֙ <WH354> as an hart פִּסֵּ֔חַ <WH6455> Then shall the lame וְתָרֹ֖ן <WH7442> sing לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> and the tongue אִלֵּ֑ם <WH483> of the dumb כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִבְקְע֤וּ <WH1234> break out בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> for in the wilderness מַ֔יִם <WH4325> shall waters וּנְחָלִ֖ים <WH5158> and streams בָּעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> in the desert

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will become הַשָּׁרָב֙ <WH8273> And the parched ground לַאֲגַ֔ם <WH98> shall become a pool וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <WH6774> and the thirsty land לְמַבּ֣וּעֵי <WH4002> springs מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water בִּנְוֵ֤ה <WH5116> in the habitation תַנִּים֙ <WH8577> of dragons רִבְצָ֔הּ <WH7258> where each lay חָצִ֖יר <WH2682> [shall be] grass לְקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> with reeds וָגֹֽמֶא׃ <WH1573> and rushes

וְהָיָה־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֞ם <WH8033> will be there מַסְל֣וּל <WH4547> And an highway וָדֶ֗רֶךְ <WH1870> shall be there and a way וְדֶ֤רֶךְ <WH1870> The way הַקֹּ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> of holiness יִקָּ֣רֵא <WH7121> and it shall be called לָ֔הּ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יַעַבְרֶ֥נּוּ <WH5674> shall not pass over טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> the unclean וְהוּא־ <WH1931> he לָ֑מוֹ הֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> it but it [shall be] for those the wayfaring men דֶּ֛רֶךְ <WH1870> way וֶאֱוִילִ֖ים <WH191> though fools לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יִתְעֽוּ׃ <WH8582> shall not err

לֹא־ <WH3808> No יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> will be there אַרְיֵ֗ה <WH738> No lion וּפְרִ֤יץ <WH6530> shall be there nor [any] ravenous חַיּוֹת֙ <WH2416> beast בַּֽל־ <WH1077> Nor יַעֲלֶ֔נָּה <WH5927> shall go up לֹ֥א <WH3808> No תִמָּצֵ֖א <WH4672> thereon it shall not be found שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there וְהָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> shall walk גְּאוּלִֽים׃ <WH1350> there but the redeemed

וּפְדוּיֵ֨י <WH6299> And the ransomed יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD יְשֻׁב֗וּן <WH7725> shall return וּבָ֤אוּ <WH935> and come צִיּוֹן֙ <WH6726> to Zion בְּרִנָּ֔ה <WH7440> with songs וְשִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> joy עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> and everlasting עַל־ <WH5921> upon רֹאשָׁ֑ם <WH7218> upon their heads שָׂשׂ֤וֹן <WH8342> and gladness וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <WH8057> joy יַשִּׂ֔יגוּ <WH5381> they shall obtain וְנָ֖סוּ <WH5127> shall flee away יָג֥וֹן <WH3015> and sorrow וַאֲנָחָֽה׃ <WH585> and sighing פ
